basic_details.name: Pranav
basic_details.role: Pranav is a Full-Stack developer and ML enthusiast.
basic_details.short_description: He crafts responsive websites where technologies meet creativity.

completed_projects.title: Job Portal App
completed_projects.description: Platform for users to apply and companies to post job openings.

completed_projects.title: Lenscape
completed_projects.description: Instagram-like app with stories, posts, and messaging.
completed_projects.techstack: React Tailwind MongoDB Ruby on Rails

completed_projects.title: SBS Alumni Webstie
completed_projects.description: Instagram-like app with stories, posts, and messaging.

small_projects.title: Bitcoin Price Predictor
small_projects.description: RNN-based model to predict BTC prices using live Binance data.

small_projects.title: BIFI: Break It Fix.
small_projects.description: Implemented the BIFI framework for unsupervised program repair, training Seq2Seq neural models to generate and fix buggy Python code using the GitHub-Python dataset and the Fairseq library.

small_projects.title: Frequent Itemset Mining using Spark-based YAFIM.
small_projects.description: Implemented the Apriori algorithm and studied the YAFIM (Yet Another Frequent Itemset Mining) algorithm for mining frequent itemsets from large, high-dimensional datasets using pyspark.

text: I’m a self-taught full-stack developer and machine learning enthusiast based in India, currently pursuing B.Tech in Mathematics and Computing. I enjoy building scalable web applications and exploring the intersection of software engineering and AI.
Always curious and eager to learn, I continuously explore new technologies in both web development and AI to stay on the cutting edge.
fun_facts: I Like winter more than summer.
Built my first app using Node Express in college.

contacts.description: I’m interested in freelance/remote-working/full-time opportunities. However, if you have other request or question, don’t hesitate to contact me
